title: [BUG] Xamarin.forms ABI break issue with X.F 4.4.0 on tizen
body:
**Description**
 I got trouble with Xamarin.forms 4.4.0 on Tizen, some API signature was changed
 https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/xamarin/xamarin-forms/release-notes/4.4/4.4.0-api
```
System.TypeLoadException: Method 'LoadImageAsync' in type 'SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.SKImageSourceHandler' from assembly 'SkiaSharp.Views.Forms, Version=1.68.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null' does not have an implementation.
```
 So, need to update referenced Xamarin.forms package version up to 4.4.0

**Code**
 None

**Expected Behavior**
 Working

**Actual Behavior**
 Got an exception 
``` 
System.TypeLoadException: Method 'LoadImageAsync' in type 'SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.SKImageSourceHandler' from assembly 'SkiaSharp.Views.Forms, Version=1.68.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null' does not have an implementation.
```
**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  1.68.2-preview.39 with Xamarin.forms 4.4.0 <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that has the issue -->
- Last known good version:  good with Xamarin.forms 4.2.0 <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that still working -->
- IDE:  <!-- Visual Studio / Visual Studio for Mac / MonoDevelop / Visual Studio Code -->
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
  - Tizen:  tizen40 <!-- the version of the Tizen SDK you are compiling against, e.g. 4.0 --> 

**Screenshots**

<!-- if the issue is a visual issue, please include screenshots showing the problem if possible -->

**Reproduction Link**

<!-- please upload or provide a link to a reproduction case -->
